thread.title: BRIEF-Acerus Licenses Natesto In 19 Central And Latin American Countries

title: BRIEF-Acerus Licenses Natesto In 19 Central And Latin American Countries
text:
16 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Acerus Licenses Natesto In 19 Central And Latin American Countries Reuters Staff 
April 13 (Reuters) - Acerus Pharmaceuticals Corporation : 
* ACERUS ANNOUNCES LICENSING OF NATESTO® IN 19 CENTRAL AND LATIN AMERICAN COUNTRIES 
* SIGNING OF AGREEMENT GRANTING PRODUCTO CIENTÍFICOS EXCLUSIVE RIGHT TO MARKET NATESTO IN 19 CENTRAL AND LATIN AMERICAN COUNTRIES 
* UNDER TERMS, WILL RECEIVE UPFRONT FEE, REGULATORY MILESTONE PAYMENTS UPON CARNOT LABORATORIOS RECEIVING MARKETING APPROVAL IN TERRITORY 
* IN ADDITION, ACERUS WILL RECEIVE A SUPPLY PRICE FOR PRODUCT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
